sourcesContent:
// Restaurant-specific menu items

export const getRestaurantMenu = (restaurantId) => {
  const menus = {
    // Saravana Bhavan (South Indian, Vegetarian)
    rest1: {
      _id: 'menu-rest1',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Dosas', 'Idli & Vada', 'Rice Items', 'Beverages'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-rest1',
          name: 'Masala Dosa',
          description: 'Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato masala',
          price: 8.99,
          category: 'Dosas',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1589301760014-d929f3979dbc?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-rest1',
          name: 'Plain Idli (2 Pcs)',
          description: 'Steamed rice cakes served with sambar and chutney',
          price: 5.99,
          category: 'Idli & Vada',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1630383249896-613fe9a9d3a1?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-rest1',
          name: 'Sambar Rice',
          description: 'Rice mixed with lentil-based vegetable stew',
          price: 7.99,
          category: 'Rice Items',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596797038530-2c107229654b?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-rest1',
          name: 'Filter Coffee',
          description: 'Traditional South Indian coffee with chicory',
          price: 2.99,
          category: 'Beverages',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544145945-f90425340c7e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    },
    
    // Murugan Idli Shop (Tamil, Vegetarian)
    rest2: {
      _id: 'menu-rest2',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Idli Varieties', 'Dosas', 'Sides', 'Beverages'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-rest2',
          name: 'Podi Idli',
          description: 'Steamed rice cakes tossed in spicy gun powder',
          price: 6.99,
          category: 'Idli Varieties',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1630383249896-613fe9a9d3a1?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-rest2',
          name: 'Ghee Podi Dosa',
          description: 'Crispy dosa with spicy gun powder and ghee',
          price: 9.99,
          category: 'Dosas',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1589301760014-d929f3979dbc?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-rest2',
          name: 'Medhu Vada',
          description: 'Crispy lentil donuts served with sambar and chutney',
          price: 5.99,
          category: 'Sides',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1630383249896-613fe9a9d3a1?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-rest2',
          name: 'Jigarthanda',
          description: 'Traditional cold beverage from Madurai',
          price: 3.99,
          category: 'Beverages',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544145945-f90425340c7e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    },
    
    // Anjappar (Chettinad, Non-Vegetarian)
    rest3: {
      _id: 'menu-rest3',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Starters', 'Main Course', 'Biryani', 'Desserts'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-rest3',
          name: 'Chettinad Chicken 65',
          description: 'Spicy deep-fried chicken marinated in Chettinad spices',
          price: 10.99,
          category: 'Starters',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-rest3',
          name: 'Chettinad Chicken Curry',
          description: 'Traditional spicy chicken curry with Chettinad masala',
          price: 12.99,
          category: 'Main Course',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 3,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-rest3',
          name: 'Chettinad Mutton Biryani',
          description: 'Fragrant rice cooked with tender mutton and Chettinad spices',
          price: 14.99,
          category: 'Biryani',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1563379091339-03b21ab4a4f8?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-rest3',
          name: 'Elaneer Payasam',
          description: 'Tender coconut pudding with condensed milk',
          price: 6.99,
          category: 'Desserts',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551024506-0bccd828d307?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    },
    
    // Ponnusamy (Tamil Nadu, Non-Vegetarian)
    rest4: {
      _id: 'menu-rest4',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Starters', 'Main Course', 'Seafood', 'Desserts'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-rest4',
          name: 'Nattu Kozhi Varuval',
          description: 'Country chicken fried with traditional spices',
          price: 11.99,
          category: 'Starters',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-rest4',
          name: 'Mutton Sukka',
          description: 'Dry mutton preparation with aromatic spices',
          price: 13.99,
          category: 'Main Course',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 3,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-rest4',
          name: 'Prawn Masala',
          description: 'Prawns cooked in spicy masala gravy',
          price: 15.99,
          category: 'Seafood',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1579684947550-22e945225d9a?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-rest4',
          name: 'Semiya Payasam',
          description: 'Vermicelli pudding with milk, nuts and cardamom',
          price: 5.99,
          category: 'Desserts',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551024506-0bccd828d307?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    },
    
    // Bawarchi (Andhra, Biryani)
    rest5: {
      _id: 'menu-rest5',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Biryani', 'Starters', 'Curries', 'Desserts'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-rest5',
          name: 'Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani',
          description: 'Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and aromatic spices',
          price: 13.99,
          category: 'Biryani',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1563379091339-03b21ab4a4f8?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-rest5',
          name: 'Chicken 555',
          description: 'Spicy boneless chicken fried with curry leaves and green chilies',
          price: 10.99,
          category: 'Starters',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 3,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-rest5',
          name: 'Andhra Chicken Curry',
          description: 'Fiery chicken curry with Andhra spices',
          price: 12.99,
          category: 'Curries',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 3,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-rest5',
          name: 'Double Ka Meetha',
          description: 'Bread pudding with saffron and nuts',
          price: 6.99,
          category: 'Desserts',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551024506-0bccd828d307?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    },
    
    // Paradise (Hyderabadi, Biryani)
    rest6: {
      _id: 'menu-rest6',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Biryani', 'Kebabs', 'Curries', 'Desserts'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-rest6',
          name: 'Paradise Special Biryani',
          description: 'Signature biryani with tender meat and aromatic spices',
          price: 14.99,
          category: 'Biryani',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1563379091339-03b21ab4a4f8?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-rest6',
          name: 'Seekh Kebab',
          description: 'Minced meat kebabs grilled with herbs and spices',
          price: 11.99,
          category: 'Kebabs',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555939594-58d7cb561ad1?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 1,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-rest6',
          name: 'Hyderabadi Haleem',
          description: 'Slow-cooked meat and lentil stew (seasonal)',
          price: 12.99,
          category: 'Curries',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-rest6',
          name: 'Qubani Ka Meetha',
          description: 'Traditional Hyderabadi dessert made with dried apricots',
          price: 7.99,
          category: 'Desserts',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551024506-0bccd828d307?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    },
    
    // Default menu for other restaurants
    default: {
      _id: 'mock-menu',
      name: 'Main Menu',
      categories: ['Starters', 'Main Course', 'Biryani', 'Desserts', 'Beverages'],
      items: [
        {
          _id: 'item1-default',
          name: 'Masala Dosa',
          description: 'Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato masala, served with sambar and chutney',
          price: 8.99,
          category: 'Main Course',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1589301760014-d929f3979dbc?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item2-default',
          name: 'Medu Vada',
          description: 'Crispy lentil donuts served with coconut chutney and sambar',
          price: 5.99,
          category: 'Starters',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1630383249896-613fe9a9d3a1?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item3-default',
          name: 'Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani',
          description: 'Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces and aromatic spices',
          price: 12.99,
          category: 'Biryani',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1563379091339-03b21ab4a4f8?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          spicyLevel: 2,
        },
        {
          _id: 'item4-default',
          name: 'Filter Coffee',
          description: 'Traditional South Indian coffee brewed with chicory',
          price: 2.99,
          category: 'Beverages',
          image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544145945-f90425340c7e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80',
          isVegetarian: true,
        },
      ],
    }
  };
  
  return menus[restaurantId] || menus.default;
};

export default getRestaurantMenu;
